name: filter-bubble
description: A browser extension for Chrome and Firefox that helps you to filter-out content from the web

scripts.web-ext-android-firefox: npm run build && web-ext run --target=firefox-android --android-device=$(adb devices  2>&1| awk '/./{device=$1} END{print device}') --firefox-apk=org.mozilla.firefox --verbose
scripts.web-ext-android-firefox-preview-nightly: npm run build && web-ext run --target=firefox-android --android-device=$(adb devices  2>&1| awk '/./{device=$1} END{print device}') --firefox-apk=org.mozilla.fenix.nightly --verbose
